title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. A, pt. 57 - Approval Of Training Providers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. A, pt. 57 - Approval Of Training Providers

State Regulations

Subpart 57-1 - Training In Child Abuse Recognition And Reporting (§ 57-1.1 to 57-1.5)

Subpart 57-2 - TRAINING IN SCHOOL VIOLENCE PREVENTION AND INTERVENTION (§ 57-2.1 to 57-2.7)

Subpart 57-3 - Training In Autism (§ 57-3.1 to 57-3.7)

Subpart 57-4 - Training In Harassment, Bullying And Discrimination Prevention And Intervention (§ 57-4.1 to 57-4.7)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. A, pt. 57

Statutory authority: Education Law, §§ 207, 208, 212, 305, 308, 3001, 3003[4], 3004, 3006, 3007, 3009, 5003, 6507[3][a]; L. 1988, ch. 544; L. 2000, ch. 181

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
